title: Davina Rankin flaunts her blossoming baby bump in a skimpy bikini
text:
She's due to give birth to her first child with boyfriend Jaxon Manuel in November.

And on Thursday, Davina Rankin, 28, was glowing as she flaunted her blossoming baby bump ahead of her due date.

Taking to Instagram, the former Married At First Sight star shared a snap of herself posing in a white skimpy bikini during a maternity shoot.

'I can’t wait to meet you my girl!' MAFS' Davina Rankin (pictured) was glowing as she flaunted her blossoming baby bump during a maternity photoshoot

The mother-to-be touched her baby bump while posing on a bed and looking in to the distance.

Her hair was styled in simple waves which fell effortlessly by her shoulders while she let her natural beauty shine wearing a neutral palette of makeup.

'I can’t wait to meet you my girl. Maternity shoot from Danielle Webster is finally here,' she captioned the post.

'I am so thankful I got her to capture this special time, I know I’ll be looking back on these photos for years to come!,' she wrote.

Bumping along: Davina (pictured) has been keeping fans up to date with her pregnancy by posting updates to social media

Davina first announced she was expecting with Jaxon back in May, revealing their first child will be due in November.

'I'll tell you its been a LONG 3 months keeping quiet for @jaxonmanuel and I, but we are so happy to finally be able to yell our exciting news from the rooftops,' she said.

'Our hearts are overflowing with love,' she wrote at the time.

Since first announcing the news, Davina has been keeping fans up to date with her pregnancy, posting updates to social media.

Exciting: Davina (left) first announced that she was expecting with Jaxon (right) back in May, revealing their first child will be due in November

Last month, the former reality television star revealed that she feels more confident about her body now than she did prior to falling pregnant.

Taking to Instagram, she wrote: 'I remember back in the day when I used to shoot for magazines like Zoo & Ralph, I was always SO insecure of my body.'

'I'd look at the photos and pick out all the different parts of me that I hated & I'd be so self conscious on set thinking about my 'cellulite' or 'fat rolls' showing,' she added.

She continued: 'I've never felt more beautiful or confident within myself EVER... I just couldn't believe that MY BODY was able to create such magic.'
description: She's due to give birth to her first child with boyfriend Jaxon Manuel in November.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
